title: President expresses deep grief over loss of lives in Swat blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 25 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Tuesday expressed his deep grief over loss of precious human lives in a blast that destroyed building of Counter Terrorism Department (CTD) Kabal, Swat on Monday night.
The president expressed his condolences with the bereaved families and prayed for them to bear the losses with fortitude, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release.
He also prayed for the high ranks of the departed souls and for the early recovery of the injured.
